name: Mystical Enchantment
additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources.
Increases most heroes' magic resistance to 25%/775%/1000%/37%.
With the magic resistance bonus from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 1%/-9%/-12%/0.84%.
